General.Name: Amprius Technologies Inc.
General.Description: Amprius Technologies, Inc. develops, manufactures, and markets lithium-ion batteries for mobility applications. The company offers silicon anode lithium-ion batteries under the SiCore and SiMaxx product platforms. Its batteries are primarily used for existing and emerging aviation applications, including unmanned aerial systems, such as drones and high-altitude pseudo satellites. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Fremont, California.
General.Address: 1180 Page Avenue, Fremont, CA, United States, 94538
